text: Jan Clausen is an American writer. She has co-edited Conditions, a journal of women's writing, with Elly Bulkin. ==Works== * After Touch, 1975 * Waking at the Bottom of the Dark, 1979. Poetry. * Mother, Sister, Daughter, Lover, 1980 * Duration, 1983. Collection of stories. * Illustrated by None: The Prosperine Papers, 1988 * Books and Life, 1989 * Beyond Gay or Straight: Understanding Sexual Orientation, 1996 * Apples and Oranges: My Journey through Sexual Identity, 1999 ==References== Category:American writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people
title: Jan Clausen
